word: BUT WHEN THAT STRONG PERSONALITY, ALTERED BY A SERIES OF STROKES, WAS TURNED ON HIS FAMILY AND ASSOCIATES--INCLUDING HIS WIFE--ELLEN FOUND HER STRENGTH AND PATIENCE STRETCHED NEARLY TO THEIR LIMITS. A PERSON WHO READS ONLY THESE FOUR LETTERS WILL CERTAINLY OBTAIN A DISTORTED PICTURE OF THE RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN JAMES AND ELLEN WHITE.
